homepage.title: Japan Map Marker Tool
homepage.subtitle: Create Your Custom Theme Map
homepage.description: Free map marking tool with custom colors and export functionality

hints.title: Editing Tips:
hints.editColor: ‚Ä¢ Click color block to change color
hints.editFields: ‚Ä¢ Label names and levels can be edited separately
hints.toggleLevel: ‚Ä¢ Click eye icon to toggle level display
hints.removeItem: ‚Ä¢ Click minus button to remove entire item

travelLevel.title: Travel Level
travelLevel.subtitle: Display your travel experience level in each Japanese prefecture

customData.title: Custom Data
customData.subtitle: You can customize the data type you want to display

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: We value your privacy and this policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We may collect the following types of information:
items: Browser information and IP addresses (for website analytics)
Anonymous usage statistics collected via Google Analytics
Map settings stored in your browser (localStorage)
Your interactions on the website (clicks, time spent, etc.)

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content: We use the collected information to:
items: Improve website functionality and user experience
Analyze website usage trends
Fix technical issues
Provide customer support

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We are committed to protecting your data:
items: We will not sell your personal information to third parties
We use secure servers and encryption technology
You can clear browser data at any time to remove locally stored settings
We comply with relevant data protection regulations

privacy.contact: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptance: By using this website, you agree to comply with the following terms of service.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.content: This website provides a free Japan map marking tool that allows users to:
items: Mark different colors and levels on the Japan map
Customize information cards and legends
Export maps in image formats
Adjust map size and layout

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: When using this service, you agree to:
items: Not use this service for illegal or harmful purposes
Not attempt to damage or interfere with website functionality
Not scrape website content in bulk
Respect the rights of other users

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
items: This service is provided 'as is' without guarantee of error-free or uninterrupted operation
We are not responsible for the accuracy of map data
Service may be suspended for maintenance or updates
We reserve the right to modify or terminate the service at any time

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
items: The website's code and design belong to the developer
The map content you create belongs to you
You can freely use and share the maps you create
Please do not copy or republish the core functionality of this website

about.title: About Us
about.introduction: Welcome to the Japan Map Marker Tool!

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We are committed to providing simple and practical map visualization tools that enable everyone to easily create professional themed maps.

features.title: Key Features
items: Complete marking support for all 47 prefectures
Multiple preset templates (travel level, safety index, etc.)
Resizable information cards
High-quality image export functionality
Multi-language support (Chinese, Japanese, English)
Completely free to use

useCases.title: Use Cases
items: Japan travel planning and travel level display
Business data visualization and regional analysis
Educational purposes and geographic information display
Social media sharing and content creation
Personal records and memory organization

technology.title: Technical Features
technology.content: This tool is developed using modern web technologies including React, Next.js, and TypeScript, ensuring excellent user experience and performance.

about.contact: If you have any suggestions or questions, please feel free to contact us!

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.introduction: We'd love to hear from you!

email.title: Email
email.responseTime: We typically respond within 3-5 business days.

support.title: Technical Support
items: Feature usage issues
Bug reports
Browser compatibility problems
Export functionality failures

feedback.title: Feedback
items: New feature suggestions
User experience improvements
Interface design suggestions
Content update requests

business.title: Business Cooperation
items: API integration needs
Custom development
Brand partnership opportunities
Media interviews

socialMedia.title: Social Media
socialMedia.description: Follow us for the latest news and feature updates.
